title: Cloud Development Team Lead
details: Led the team to enhance productivity and streamline agile processes, ensuring timely delivery of high-quality software.
Achieved the Scrum Master Certification, demonstrating expertise in agile methodologies and team leadership.
Led the delivery of a new product from incpetion to delivery in 6 months to secure a Â£1.8million recurring revenue deal for the company.
Mentored and promoted a junior developer within their first year, guiding their professional growth and contributing to team success.
Engaged in design-based activities, planning sessions, and the implementation of .NET based products.
Collaborated with other team members to ensure solutions are scalable, performant, and easy to maintain.
Adhered to coding standards, conduct code reviews, and promote a culture of clean, high-quality code.

title: Junior Developer
details: Created MVC websites using the Microsoft .Net framework.
Built responsive web pages using the Bootstrap 4 framework.
Built apps using jQuery and Vue.js.
Worked on a fluid-dynamic selection engine written in C#.
